tool_description: Detects and quantifies chemical contaminants including pesticides, industrial chemicals, and organic compounds using colorimetric and reagent-based field tests.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

target_chemicals.description: List of chemicals to test for

test_kit_type.description: Type of test kit: colorimetric, strip_test, reagent_based, or electronic_sensor

sample_volume_ml.description: Volume of sample used for testing in milliliters

ambient_temperature.description: Ambient temperature in Celsius during testing

reaction_time_minutes.description: Reaction time for colorimetric tests in minutes

dilution_factor.description: Sample dilution factor if pre-dilution was performed

error_messages: Invalid test kit type: Must be one of [colorimetric, strip_test, reagent_based, electronic_sensor]
Unsupported chemical: One or more target chemicals not supported by selected test kit
Insufficient sample volume: Sample volume too small for selected number of tests
Temperature out of range: Ambient temperature must be between 15°C and 35°C for accurate results
Expired reagents: Test kit reagents have exceeded expiration date
Cross-contamination detected: Sample handling may have introduced contaminants
Reaction time exceeded: Test results invalid due to excessive reaction time
usage: Specify sample ID, target chemicals, and test kit type. Ensure adequate sample volume and appropriate temperature. Follow timing requirements strictly for colorimetric tests.

detected_chemicals.description: List of chemicals detected above detection limits

concentration_values.description: Concentration values corresponding to detected chemicals in mg/L

safety_status.description: Overall safety assessment based on detected chemical levels

exceeds_limits.description: Chemicals that exceed safe drinking water limits
